showcases.title: SAP Sports One
showcases.author: SAP
showcases.description: Available for soccer, ice hockey, basketball, handball, skiing, and rugby, SAP Sports One software helps clubs and organizations digitalize sports performance and team management.
showcases.usage: The Web apps provided by SAP Sports One are built with SAPUI5, using a custom theme on top of the Base theme. Data coming from a SAP HANA XS backend are bound to the UI via JSON model.

showcases.title: SAP Digital Boardroom
showcases.author: SAP
showcases.description: SAP Digital Boardroom gives decision makers a real-time, digital-enterprise experience. It integrates with line-of-business data to provide a single source of truth for most important business metrics.

showcases.title: SAP Business ByDesign (ByD)
showcases.author: SAP
showcases.description: SAP Business ByDesign is an all-encompassing cloud ERP solution with built-in analytics and an extension platform for partners hosted by SAP, delivered as-a-Service targeting mid-market businesses.
showcases.usage: ByD UIs are modelled screens similar to SAP Fiori elements, interpreted at runtime by the Oberon framework. The Oberon framework is based on SAPUI5 extending Core models and binding concepts.

showcases.title: SAP Customer Engagement Center on SAP Cloud Platform
showcases.author: SAP Hybris
showcases.description: SAP Customer Engagement Center offers a unified agent desktop with built-in communication channels, ticketing and visibility into customer data and interaction history.
showcases.usage: For the UI SAPUI5 was explicitly chosen to leverage SAPUI5's standard development procedures, rich enterprise readiness and richness of enterprise controls.

showcases.title: SAP Connected Health Platform
showcases.author: SAP
showcases.description: The SAP Connected Health platform serves as a platform for processing and real-time analysis of large amounts of medical data from various sources in a single system.
showcases.usage: SAP Health uses SAPUI5 due to its high integration with other SAP components like SAP HANA XS and its uniform look & feel across different applications.

showcases.title: SAP Medical Research Insights
showcases.author: internal
showcases.description: SAP Medical Research Insights is a clinical analytics solution running on the SAP Connected Health platform that allows for interactive analysis of medical data.
showcases.usage: For healthcare-specific use-cases, custom controls are used for providing visualizations and improvements for clinicians while keeping the integration with the SAPUI5 components.

showcases.title: Predictive Factory
showcases.author: SAP
showcases.description: Predictive Factory is a thin-client, Web server-based application that lets you automate the management of predictive models created in SAP Predictive Analytics.
showcases.usage: The Web app is based on SAPUI5 and, above all, utilizes the sap.m library to get responsive behavior out of the box. The JAVA back-end communicates with the UI using JSON-RPC or OData as protocol.

showcases.title: SAP Web IDE
showcases.author: SAP
showcases.description: SAP Web IDE is a powerful, extensible, web-based, and integrated development tool that simplifies the end-to-end development of SAPUI5 apps.

showcases.title: Schoenmaatjes Project
showcases.author: Edukans
showcases.description: The Schoenmaatjes project sends shoeboxes of toys and supplies packed by kids in the Netherlands to children in developing countries.
showcases.usage: The project Web app built with SAPUI5 is designed to move kids easily through the registration process of the box including a personal greeting and a picture to their peer on a mobile device.

showcases.title: HR Launchpad (ESS/MSS)
showcases.author: Sovanta
showcases.description: This modern and intuitive usable cross-platform app for retail personnel enables digital access to ESS/MSS scenarios via private devices.
showcases.usage: Based on SAPUI5 the Web app utilizes sap.ui.core, sap.m, sap.ui.layout plus custom controls partially build upon existing controls. For communication with the back-end OData  and the OData V2 model is used.

showcases.title: SAPUI5 CPQ (Configure-Price&Quote)
showcases.author: Musa Arda
showcases.description:
SAPUI5 CPQ App runs on SAP Hana Cloud Platform.
It was developed in SAP WebIDE with SAPUI5. (Extending SAPUI5 Controls)
It is embedded in an HTML Mashup in SAP Hybris C4C Customer Quote Screen.
It is a hybrid app, connecting both C4C and SAP ERP. 
It consumes OData services for connecting C4C and ERP.
It uses SSO (Single Sign On) for authentication.
It uses Real-Time SAP Variant Configuration Data for Materials.
showcases.usage: This app is completely developed in SAPUI5. Mainly with standard controls. I have also extended some controls.
